DOC.brief_summary: Overall Study Design Plan Description - The study conduct woman fertility difficulty designate intrauterine insemination treatment ( IUI ) . The research sample size 137 treatment cycle per group ( total 274 treatment cycle ) . The woman randomly divide two group . Some undergo standard bolus IUI treatment others treat EVIE Slow Release Insemination method ( SRI ) . Women fail conceive first treatment next receive alternative treatment . This mean woman treat IUI method become pregnant treated SRI , vice versa ( crossover method ) . The study include woman treat Clomiphene Citrate Gonadotropin-based treatment . Every couple treat undergo least 2 insemination cycle ( unless pregnancy already achieve ) . - Before begin hormone treatment , couple trial procedure explain . This explanation include detail information instruction IUI Slow Release Insemination method . A Patient Information Sheet available . - Preparation spermatozoon intra uterine insemination identical method perform currently IUI . Approximately two week insemination treatment , blood sample take woman check Beta hCG level indicate pregnancy . Hypothesis : SRI lead high pregnancy rate compare standard IUI Primary endpoint : â€¢ Pregnancy rate Effect control Intra-uterine slow release insemination pregnancy rate woman designate intra uterine insemination comparison accept IUI method .
DOC.brief_title: EVIE-Study : Slow Release Insemination Versus Standard Intrauterine Insemination Study
DOC.criteria: 1 . Women primary secondary infertility 6 month unprotected intercourse candidate IUI 2 . Age woman 20 40 year old 3 . Normal uterus xray ( HSG ) Chromotubation determine tubal patency 4 . Women infertility background nonovulation 5 . Infertility background male problem ( 10 million/ml motile sperm cell per sample ) 6 . Infertility background unexplained cause 7 . Same sex patient / single patient 8 . Signed informed consent 1 . Woman age 20 age 40 year 2 . Female infertility mechanical background affect uterus Fallopian tube 3 . Infertility male background medium low level spermatozoon le 10 million/ml motile sperm cell per sample 4 . Men woman oppose random spermatozoa insemination method 5 . Participants willing sign Consent Form 6 . BMI > 30
